name: Mahjong Shanghai Solitaire
description:
Download now and play the classic solitaire tiles game you know and love, in glorious full HD.

Play loads of different layouts, arranged in different sizes, so you can always find a game to fit any spare moment. From the small 70 tile quickie levels, to the challenging 220 tile marathons, you'll always find a favorite to keep coming back to.

Play can be untimed if you just want to zen out, or you can earn stars for beating the worldwide average times and/or setting new world records (no account creation needed).

Tons of customisation options, beautiful soundtrack, rich and full HD graphics. Pickable backgrounds too!

This game is also known as Mahjongg Solitaire, Shanghai Solitaire, Taipei Solitaire and pretty much any other historic Chinese town followed by the word Solitaire.

We think this is the best free mahjongg game on the store, and we will be expanding it a lot in the near future to bring you even more puzzles and play options.

Free Mahjongg, what could be better! Download right now and chill out...
